notes.body: Hello Tanusree,       Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern is in regard to your order #638782411230097408. As per the system, the order has been delivered to you on 19th October 2025. Any changes that need to be made to the invoice can be accepted within 30 days of the order delivery. Hence, we regret to inform you that we are unable to comply with your request to make the changes.     Please be informed that for non-prescription medicines/products, the invoice is prepared as per the profile name mentioned at the time of placing the order. If the prescription is uploaded for non-prescription medicines/products, the invoice will be prepared as per the uploaded prescription.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Subhendu,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the deleted medicine from the order. I will surely assist you with this.     Please be informed that the requested medicine, JUBIRA 10MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it is removed from the order.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the partner retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.  ​   I can see the requested medicine ROZUCOR 10MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with ROSUBEST 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS to fulfil your medicine requirements.     As per the system, the medicine has been changed by the doctor. Kindly confirm whether the medicine has been changed with consent.  ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Subhendu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the deleted medicine from the order. I will surely assist you with this.

Please be informed that the requested medicine, JUBIRA 10MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it is removed from the order.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the partner retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.
​
I can see the requested medicine ROZUCOR 10MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with ROSUBEST 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS to fulfil your medicine requirements.

As per the system, the medicine has been changed by the doctor. Kindly confirm whether the medicine has been changed with consent.

notes.body: Hello Shyam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your query related to the return request for ​ARM SLING POUCH PRO S LIVEASY. I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.  ​   Please be informed that the replacement/ exchange feature is currently unavailable.   As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.  ​ For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Shyam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your query related to the return request for ​ARM SLING POUCH PRO S LIVEASY. I am sorry to inform you that the requested medicine comes under non-returnable medicine/item. Hence, we will be unable to return the requested medicine or process a refund. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.
​
Please be informed that the replacement/ exchange feature is currently unavailable.

As per PharmEasy's return policy, an item marked as "non-returnable" on the product detail page or medicines whose return window has expired cannot be returned. Hence, I am sorry to inform you that we will be unable to comply with your request to return this item.
​
For more details on our return policy, you can refer to the link: https://pharmeasy.in/help/returns-43000349468
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Charushila,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #654119564530655232-75947, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine CLINDINOL 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to make any changes to the registered mobile number. Hence, I would request you to create a new account with the active number. I am really sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.     If your concern is related to any order, kindly share the order ID. I will be more than happy to check your order and assist you further.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Mehboob Alam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #652909253651832832-94172, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.      As per update received,the request for refund of Rs.683.77/- in your source account has been sent and the same will be reflected in your source account within 5-7 business days.  We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Once the amount gets credited to your PharmEasy wallet (refund cash) you can use the full amount in your next order and also there is no expiry for this amount.  Asloe we have arrange manual pick up for 1 qty of MINOBOOST F 5% BOTTLE OF 60ML SOLUTION  and same wll be pick up shortly.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mehboob Alam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #652909253651832832-94172, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.
  
As per update received,the request for refund of Rs.683.77/- in your source account has been sent and the same will be reflected in your source account within 5-7 business days.  We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Once the amount gets credited to your PharmEasy wallet (refund cash) you can use the full amount in your next order and also there is no expiry for this amount.

Asloe we have arrange manual pick up for 1 qty of MINOBOOST F 5% BOTTLE OF 60ML SOLUTION  and same wll be pick up shortly.
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi, Thank you for reaching out to our Payroll Helpdesk.
This email is
to acknowledge that we have received your inquiry and
are committed to assisting you. Your concerns are important to us,
and we will do our best to provide you with
a prompt resolution. Our team will review your query
and will get back to you within the next 1-2 business
working days with the necessary information and assistance. Please note that
response times may vary based on the complexity of the issue. For Relieving
Letter Requests: You can
expect to receive your relieving letter within 3-4 days
from your F & F settlement payout day. If any F & F recovery
is applicable, we will communicate this
to you separately. For PF
Related Concerns: Please
note that these matters involve coordination with the EPFO Department, which
may require additional time for resolution. Form 16 for
Financial Year 2024-25: Ex-employees who left the company during the financial year 2024-25
or later for them had already sent Form 16 Part A & B on 1st July'25
on the personal email id as per our records. You may search it with Subject:
"Form 16 for FY 24-25 has been released" Form 16 for Financial Year 2023-24: Ex-employees who left the company during the financial year
2023-24 or later for them had already sent Form 16 Part A & B on
19th-20th June'24 on the personal email id as per our records. You may search
it with Subject: "Form 16 for FY 23-24 has been released" Should you find
that you have not received a response within the
aforementioned timelines, we kindly ask you to follow the
escalation matrix outlined below. Escalation Matrix: Level 1: Nilesh
Matele Email: nilesh.matele@pharmeasy.in Level 2: Amey
Joshi Email: amey.joshi@pharmeasy.in We are here to
assist you and ensure that your concerns are addressed
appropriately. Thank you for your understanding and
cooperation. Note : This is an
auto-generated email. Please do not reply. -- Best regards, HR team

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi,
Thank you for reaching out to our Payroll Helpdesk. This email is to acknowledge that we have received your inquiry and are committed to assisting you. Your concerns are important to us, and we will do our best to provide you with a prompt resolution.
Our team will review your query and will get back to you within the next 1-2 business working days with the necessary information and assistance. Please note that response times may vary based on the complexity of the issue.
For Relieving Letter Requests: You can expect to receive your relieving letter within 3-4 days from your F & F settlement payout day. If any F & F recovery is applicable, we will communicate this to you separately. 
For PF Related Concerns: Please note that these matters involve coordination with the EPFO Department, which may require additional time for resolution. 
Form 16 for Financial Year 2024-25: Ex-employees who left the company during the financial year 2024-25 or later for them had already sent Form 16 Part A & B on 1st July'25 on the personal email id as per our records. You may search it with Subject: "Form 16 for FY 24-25 has been released"
Form 16 for Financial Year 2023-24: Ex-employees who left the company during the financial year 2023-24 or later for them had already sent Form 16 Part A & B on 19th-20th June'24 on the personal email id as per our records. You may search it with Subject: "Form 16 for FY 23-24 has been released"
Should you find that you have not received a response within the aforementioned timelines, we kindly ask you to follow the escalation matrix outlined below.
Escalation Matrix:
Level 1: Nilesh Matele Email: nilesh.matele@pharmeasy.in
Level 2: Amey Joshi Email: amey.joshi@pharmeasy.in
 
We are here to assist you and ensure that your concerns are addressed appropriately. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
 
Note : This is an auto-generated email. Please do not reply. 


--
Best regards,
HR team

notes.body: Hello Gaurav,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #655277956559450112, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine PRAZOPRESS XL 5MG STRIP OF 30 TABLETS of 1 quantity and NATRILIX 1.5MG SR STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Gaurav,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655277956559450112, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine PRAZOPRESS XL 5MG STRIP OF 30 TABLETS of 1 quantity and NATRILIX 1.5MG SR STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.

Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22251703  
      Subject: How is the discount calculated?  
      Description:  The price shown before adding medicines to cart is low and after adding the medicines to cart the price increases and then you provide discounts For eg a medicine Follihair new Tablet has a MRP of Rs 782.16 and the price before adding to cart was Rs 492.76 but after adding the medicine to cart. The price is showing is Rs 610.08 the above is just one example for 1 medicine but this same thing happens with all medicines. In this way you are fooling customers, the customers add Medicines seeing the price but you increase the price after adding the medicine to cart. notes.body: Hello Shruti,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  I would like to inform you that the discount displayed in the search option is part of our "Best Pricing" feature. This discount can be availed by applying the appropriate coupon code. You will find the applicable coupon code displayed at the top of the cart page.     I am sorry to inform you that the images which is you shared I am unable to open, I would like to request you to send the images again in JPEG or PNG format so that we can take further action.   Awaiting your earliest response.   Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Shruti,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I would like to inform you that the discount displayed in the search option is part of our "Best Pricing" feature. This discount can be availed by applying the appropriate coupon code. You will find the applicable coupon code displayed at the top of the cart page.

I am sorry to inform you that the images which is you shared I am unable to open, I would like to request you to send the images again in JPEG or PNG format so that we can take further action.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Souvik,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #654382867734331392-46411, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Souvik,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654382867734331392-46411, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Support,

I am Samir Pilani, an esteemed customer ordering medicine and
booking lab tests from Pharmeasy since *2019*.
I am writing to report a *critical* issue regarding a *failed* transaction
where the amount was debited from my credit card but no order was
successfully placed.
The purchase attempt was made on *October 29, 2025*, and the funds were
debited from my account immediately. However, the transaction ultimately
failed, and I did not receive an order confirmation. So had to make a
second payment which was successful.

*Failed Transaction Details:*

*Order ID: 642494838056493056*
*Transaction Date: October 29, 2025*
*Debited Amount: Rs. 996.05*
*Payment Method: Credit Card (SBI Cards)*
*Issue: Amount was debited, but order was not placed.*

Since the transaction failed on your system, the funds should have been
immediately released by your payment processor. As over a month has passed
since the debit (October 29, 2025), I require *immediate resolution*.

Please *investigate* this issue and
issue Immediate Refund. SBI Card also has not issued any refund, it means
amount is with merchant only not with the bank.

I have attached SBI Credit Card *card statement(s)* having the debit as
proof of payment and till date *no refund* transaction amounting Rs. 996.05
.

*Attached Pdf details*:
1) Billed/Generated Card Statement (20th October,2025 to 19th November,2025)
2) Unbilled Card Statement (20th November,2025 to till date)

*Note - Credit Card is of my father - Mr. Dinesh Pilani *

Please treat this as urgent due to the extended period the funds have been
held.
Thank you for your immediate assistance.

Sincerely,
Samir Pilani
Mobile number - 7042078180
Alternate Mobile number - 7982107103

--

notes.body: We checked the payment for your recent order and found that the transaction is marked as Failed with the status “Abandoned”. This usually happens when the payment session does not complete within the required time for example, due to a slow network, switching apps during payment, or the bank not sending a timely confirmation back to us.     Since you paid using a credit card, the amount has not been captured by us, even though it may appear as a charge on your card. In such cases, your bank will automatically reverse or drop the charge, typically within 5–7 business days.   You may see it updated as a “reversal” or the charge may simply disappear from your statement once the bank completes the process.     If the reversal does not reflect within this timeline, please share a credit card statement or transaction reference, and we’ll be happy to assist further.
notes.body_html:

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22251476  
      Subject: Wrong item supplied Order ID 654793881173315584 and your Customer support Telephone Numbers  
      Description:  
   
        
 Namaskaram.' 
   
 A. Wrong Item supplied : 
 
  Order ID 654793881173315584 
  I had ordered:  
 
Onetouch Ultrasoft Lancets | Pack Of 50 Lancets (Rs. 350/-)
 
   
However, what is actually supplied is  
Onetouch Ultrasoft 2 Lancets | 2 Packs Of 25 Lancets (Rs. 164/- each) So  a total of Rs. 328/-
 
 
 For your easy understanding, the difference between these two products is written in red bold underlined and with a larger font.
 
 
 
  There are two issues here.  
 1. Wrong item is supplied This should be replaced with the correct item as per my order forthwith without any delay.
 
 2. The cost of the wrongly supplied item is Rs. 328/- which is obviously less than What I have paid for.. 
   
 This is a totally careless and unacceptable attitude of your pharmacy  partner. How is it tolerated and accepted by you? 
   
 B. Your customer support network and contact number : 
   
 
I opened the packet yesterday after it was delivered to me and found that you have supplied me with the wrong item. I tried to raise a return /  replacement request through your App and also by logging on to your website. I followed all the instructions. It  says,  "We are sorry you had to experience this. Click on the Account icon on the App homepage, click on the "Orders" section, tap on the respective order, click on "View details" from the shipment & click 'Return'. We will try to resolve this on priority." 
 
   
 
 I clicked on all the lines that were displayed on the "shipment details" screen but never got the Return tab. I clicked on "Still  Need Help" which gave the number: to call 07666100300 .  I called this number twice yesterday at about 10:20 pm. Both the times, the calls got automatically disconnected. Today, there was a taped message that the number is updated to 8071324888 .  
   
 When I tried  this new number, I found out that this number  can be used ONLY to order either medicines or a lab test.. No other option is available.  
   
 In this whole rigmarole, there is no simple way for a customer to approach  you and convey his needs, lodge a complaint or ask for replacements of wrong supplies. 
   
 I DO NOT UNDERSTAND: 
 WHY YOUR WEBSITE CONTINUES TO GIVE THE OLD NUMBER? 
 WHAT PREVENTS YOU FROM GIVING THE CORRECT NUMBER ON YOUR WEBSITE?  
 WHAT PREVENTS FROM UPDATING YOUR WEBSITE?  
 WHAT PREVENTS YOU FROM MAKING THE LIFE OF YOUR CUSTOMER COMFORTABLE BY EASING HIS ACCESS TO YOU EITHER THROUGH YOOUR APP OR THROUGH YOUR WEBSITE? 
   
 
   
 Although I feel that this whole issue may not get any response from you and I may not get answers to my queries and that your customers will still have difficulty to approach you. 
 
Now, I only hope that I get what I have actually ordered in place of what your pharmacy partner has decided to send me. 
 
   
 
PS. In contrast to this, I had a beautiful experience with one of your competitors. I had ordered a wrong item and realized it when I received the consignment. I informed using their App that I had ordered a wrong item, wanted to return the same and exchange it t another item that I actually needed. Within a few minutes, I received a call from them to inform me that I do not have to return the WRONGLY ORDERED item but full refund for the same was immediately being processed by them. I was further informed to place an order for the correct item I needed. COMPARE THIS WITH MY PRESENTI EXPERIENCE WITH YOU. IN YOUR CASE, I AM STRUGGLING TO LET YOU KNOW THAT I RECEIVED A WRONG IITEM AND I NEED THE SAME TO BE REPLACED BY WHAT I ORDERED WITH YOU. 
 Pranam.   Vasant K. Kulkarni  
 
 
Tel : +91 98204 98803 
   
 “If you are willing to strive, you can transcend all your limitations.” ~ Sadhguru    
        
 

 
 Disclaimer: 
 This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. notes.body_html:
Hello Sonu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655488098824450048-85165, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 05th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy
